data.title: Kalpana Patowary from Sarukhetri constituency: Early Life, Education, Career and Politics
data.meta_description: Know About Kalpana Patowary political life, educational qualification, biography, early life & much from The Sentinel.
data.text:
Kalpana Patowary's Biography:

Candidate's Gender

Party

Constituency

Female

Asom Gana Parishad

Sarukhetri

Early Life:

Kalpana Patowary is the wife of Parvez Khan. She is 43 years old and is a resident of Madhuban Path No.-1, Hengrabari, Dispur. Her husband is an Event Manager and owns a studio.

Education:

Kalpana Patowary received her B.A. degree with a Major in English from Cotton College in the year 1998.

Career & Political Life:

Kalpana Patowary is a popular singer from Assam. She is known as the 'Bhojpuri Queen' as she has sung some very popular numbers in the Bhojpuri language. She is a first-time candidate. She is contesting as an Asom Gana Parishad candidate from Sarukhetri constituency.
